data.name: Forsaken Universe
data.detailed_description:
Forsaken Universe is a space-exploration-survival game based on a unique universe. Become one of the elite space explorers in the universe by completing missions, building a solid base, killing space pirates and aliens, or many other ways.

The Universe

After the black hole was discovered, it was only a matter of time before it reached the colonized planets. All planets were destroyed and became forsaken. Discover many unique planets around the universe that survived the black hole.

Survival

Survival has always been the goal of any civilization. Find food either by farming, exploring, trading, buying, or baking. Drink water to keep your motor functions running so you don't lock up. If you lock up, you die.

The Cyborgs

Once the planet became inhabitable, it was time for humans to transfer their consciousness into cyborgs. Slowly, each and all cyborgs started waking up after the black hole. They started expanding and creating their civilizations on other planets.

Warning!


Forsaken Universe contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised!

data.short_description: Forsaken Universe is an exploration-survival game based on a unique universe. Become one of the Elite space explorers in the universe by completing missions, building a strong base, killing space pirates and aliens, or many different other ways. Can you explore all the planets and survive?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 2GB / AMD R9 280 better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is highly recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 / AMD R9 Fury
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is highly recommended.
